author: andschwa
body: I'll add repro when not on phone.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Looked into this further, it was PEBKAC. The behavior is that a folder's contents are not enumerated for tab-completion until the folder is "completed" by appending a slash.

On Windows, the behavior is a little smarter. If there is only one completion, it is made, and if there are multiple completions, they are listed.

But this becomes moot if we ship with PSReadline by default, e.g. #833.

title: Tab completion of items inside .folders is broken
